notes.text: sap.suite.ui.microchart.InteractiveBarChart: Control enhanced
sap.suite.ui.microchart.InteractiveBarChart: ScreenReader support added
sap.suite.ui.microchart.InteractiveDonutChart: Control enhanced
sap.suite.ui.microchart.InteractiveDonutChart: Unlimited number of segments supported
sap.suite.ui.microchart.InteractiveLineChart: Control enhanced
sap.suite.ui.microchart.AreaMicroChart: Color handling for chart and target corrected
sap.suite.ui.microchart.AreaMicroChart: Responsiveness of labels adapted
sap.suite.ui.microchart.BulletMicroChart: Actual value bar and marker improved
sap.suite.ui.microchart.BulletMicroChart: Responsiveness of labels adapted
sap.suite.ui.microchart.ColumnMicroChart: Hover style in case of non interactive column corrected
sap.suite.ui.microchart.ColumnMicroChart: Responsiveness of labels adapted
sap.suite.ui.microchart.ComparisonMicroChart: Responsiveness of labels adapted
sap.suite.ui.microchart.ComparisonMicroChart: Suppressing tooltip if it consists only of whitespace characters
sap.suite.ui.microchart.DeltaMicroChart: HCB text color corrected
sap.suite.ui.microchart.DeltaMicroChart: Responsiveness of labels adapted
sap.suite.ui.microchart.HarveyBallMicroChart: Labels are no longer visible after app navigation
sap.suite.ui.microchart.RadialMicroChart: Resizing works inside the GenericTile control
sap.suite.ui.microchart.RadialMicroChart: Test page improved
sap.suite.ui.microchart.StackedBarMicroChart: Documentation of maxValue property adapted
sap.suite.ui.microchart.StackedBarMicroChart: Labels no longer wrap outside the control
sap.suite.ui.microchart: Visibility check for different scenarios adapted
sap.suite.ui.microchart: sap.m.Size.Responsive support corrected
sap.suite.ui.microchart.AreaMicroChart: Label truncation for Internet Explorer and Edge corrected
sap.suite.ui.microchart.RadialMicroChart: If percentage value is 0, percentageMode still enabled
sap.suite.ui.microchart.ColumnMicroChart: Tooltip and screen reader improved
sap.suite.ui.microchart.DeltaMicroChart: Tooltip and screen reader improved
sap.suite.ui.microchart.AreaMicroChart: Tooltip and screen reader improved
sap.suite.ui.microchart.BulletMicroChart: Tooltip and screen reader improved
sap.suite.ui.microchart.ComparisonMicroChart: Tooltip and screen reader improved
sap.suite.ui.microchart.HarveyBallMicroChart: Tooltip and screen reader improved
sap.suite.ui.microchart.InteractiveDonutChart: Left side overflow corrected
sap.suite.ui.microchart.RadialMicroChart: Tooltip and screen reader improved
sap.suite.ui.microchart.StackedBarMicroChart: Bar tooltips are now also used in aggregated tooltip
sap.suite.ui.microchart.InteractiveBarChart: Bar display for big values with auto-scaling corrected
sap.suite.ui.microchart.StackedBarMicroChart: Stop click event propagation when chart has press event
sap.suite.ui.microchart.AreaMicroChart: Layouting canvas element as block independent from browser
sap.suite.ui.microchart.ComparisonMicroChart: Rendering of labels improved
